statements: SELECT * FROM RainfallData WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_id, date, rainfall_amount FROM RainfallData WHERE rainfall_amount > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(rainfall_amount) AS max_rainfall FROM RainfallData;
SELECT region_id, SUM(rainfall_amount) AS total_rainfall FROM RainfallData GROUP BY region_id ORDER BY total_rainfall DESC;
SELECT * FROM RainfallData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM RainfallData WHERE region_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, rainfall_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT region_id, SUM(rainfall_amount) AS total_rainfall FROM RainfallData GROUP BY region_id ORDER BY total_rainfall DESC
SELECT AVG(rainfall_amount) AS average_rainfall, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM RainfallData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT region_id, date, rainfall_amount FROM RainfallData WHERE region_id IN (2, 4) AND rainfall_amount > 50 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT region_id FROM RainfallData ORDER BY region_id ASC
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM region ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rainfall_data WHERE rainfall_amount > 50;
SELECT region_name, rainfall_amount FROM region JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id;
SELECT region_name, measurement_date FROM region JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM region JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id WHERE region.region_id = 1 AND rainfall_amount > 100 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT region_id, SUM(rainfall_amount) AS total_rainfall FROM rainfall_data GROUP BY region_id HAVING SUM(rainfall_amount) > 500 ORDER BY total_rainfall DESC
SELECT region_id, AVG(rainfall_amount) AS average_rainfall FROM rainfall_data WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' GROUP BY region_id ORDER BY average_rainfall DESC
SELECT region_name, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM region LEFT JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING data_count > 2 ORDER BY data_count ASC
SELECT region_name, MAX(rainfall_amount) AS max_rainfall FROM region LEFT JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id GROUP BY region_name ORDER BY max_rainfall DESC
SELECT * FROM region
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM region
SELECT end_date, start_date FROM time_period
SELECT data_id, region_id, time_period_id, rainfall_amount FROM rainfall_data
SELECT region_id, COUNT(*) FROM rainfall_data GROUP BY region_id
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT region_name FROM region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, rainfall_amount FROM region JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id;
SELECT region_name, start_date, end_date FROM region JOIN time_period ON region.region_id = time_period.region_id WHERE region.region_id < 5;
SELECT region_name, MAX(rainfall_amount) AS max_rainfall FROM region JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, start_date, end_date FROM region JOIN time_period ON region.region_id = time_period.period_id;
SELECT * FROM rainfall_data WHERE rainfall_amount > 50;
SELECT AVG(average_rainfall) AS average_rainfall FROM average_rainfall WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM region ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, rainfall_amount FROM region JOIN rainfall_data ON region.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id;
SELECT period_id, start_date, end_date FROM time_period WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(rainfall_amount) AS avg_rainfall_amount FROM rainfall_data;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_name, avg_rainfall FROM regions JOIN avg_rainfall ON regions.region_id = avg_rainfall.region_id WHERE avg_rainfall.avg_rainfall > 50;
SELECT * FROM time_periods WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT region_name, rainfall_amount FROM regions JOIN rainfall_data ON regions.region_id = rainfall_data.region_id WHERE rainfall_amount >= 100;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, start_date, end_date FROM time_periods WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT region_name, rainfall_amount FROM regions r JOIN rainfall_data rd ON r.region_id = rd.region_id WHERE rd.rainfall_amount > 100;
SELECT region_name, AVG(rainfall_amount) AS average_rainfall FROM regions r JOIN rainfall_data rd ON r.region_id = rd.region_id GROUP BY region_name;
